node.title: Victorian teen gets more than six years for stabbing manslaughter of Thomas Tran, judge says he 'agonised' over sentence
node.alt: Thomas Tran smiles, wearing a black t-shirt.
node.description: Lindim Aliti is sentenced to more than six years in prison for fatally stabbing Thomas Tran through the heartÂ after a violent clash between two groups of young men in Melbourne's outer south-east.
node.content:
["Dandenong teenager\u00a0Lindim Aliti\u00a0has been sentenced to more than six years in prison for fatally stabbing Springvale man Thomas Tran through the heart last year, after a violent clash between two groups of young men in Melbourne's outer south-east.", "Justice Michael Croucher told the Supreme Court of Victoria that a dispute started early on the night of June 29 with \"casually traded slights of the middle-finger kind\" outside\u00a0a Domino's Pizza restaurant in Oakleigh.", "He said it ended hours later with a tragedy he feared Mr Tran's parents \"will never recover from.\"", "The court heard Mr Tran \"bled to death because his heart had been pierced\" when Aliti stabbed him in the chest.", "Ambulance officers arrived within minutes, but Mr Tran died on the street where he had collapsed.", "He was just 20.", "", "
Thomas Tran died at the scene in Oakleigh.(ABC News)
", "Justice Croucher sentenced Aliti to a prison sentence of six and a half years for manslaughter, with a non-parole period of three and a half years, and recommended he\u00a0serve that sentence in a youth justice centre.", "He noted the extreme pain and grief Mr Tran's parents had experienced.", "In court, the Tran family and supporters were visibly upset when the sentence was read out.", "In a written victim impact statement, Mai Tran told the court she had not been able to sleep properly or work since her only child's death.", "\"I will never forget the police officer telling us he was gone,\" she said.", "\"My heart has had nothing in it since then.\"", "Her husband\u00a0Tan Nhieu\u00a0said he still sat in his son's room and put on his clothes to try and feel close to his deceased child.", "During the sentencing hearing, the court heard a detailed account of how\u00a0the fight escalated.", "
'We'll be back, and we'll bring more people'
", "It was just after 6:30pm when friends of Aliti's gave the middle finger to Andre Huc, a friend of Mr Tran's, outside the Domino's Pizza restaurant.", "A verbal clash occurred, which the judge said included slurs that could not be repeated.", "As Aliti's friends left, the court heard they yelled, \"We'll be back, and we'll bring more people.\"", "One of the people in that group was Veton Rasimi, who then sent a message to 26 friends on Snapchat.", "Mr Rasimi told the Snapchat group that he'd had a \"run-in with the Greeks in Oakleigh.\"", "He organised for friends to head to Oakleigh.", "Mr Huc also contacted some friends after seeing some of Mr Rasimi's group on the street in Oakleigh after the clash.", "One of the friends Mr Huc contacted was Mr Tran.", "The two groups clashed just before 8pm in a carpark in Oakleigh.", "The judge\u00a0told the court Mr Rasimi's group was armed with weapons, including poles, machetes and a knife.", "When Mr Rasimi and his friends ran away, they were pursued by Mr Tran and friends.", "It was at this point that Aliti arrived in Oakleigh and saw his friends being chased.", "Mr Tran gave up the\u00a0chase near Atherton Road and started walking back to Mr Huc.", "The court heard Mr Tran was unarmed, alone and was no longer in pursuit of others when he was approached by Aliti, who stabbed him in the chest and hip.", "The court heard Aliti later said the stabbing occurred when he was \"alone and frightened\".", "
Aliti fled scene, bragged about stabbing
", "The judge said Aliti fled the scene after stabbing Mr Tran and did not render help.", "The court was told messages sent in the Snapchat group noted friends of Aliti celebrating the stabbing, including one message which read: \"On ya Lindim.\"", "The judge\u00a0said Aliti went to a pool hall in Dandenong South with friends after the stabbing.", "Security cameras there captured him talking to a friend and then telling a friend:\u00a0\"That's one down now, confirmation.\"", "The judge described that as \"a heartless thing to say\".", "
'When I see Thomas's photos, I cry all the time'
", "Both of Mr Tran's parents provided lengthy statements to the court.", "\"Thomas was my only child,\" Ms Tran wrote.", "\"I expected to see him grow up and marry, and now I won't.\"", "She spoke of the 20-year-old son who had plans of becoming a personal trainer.", "\"Thomas was always smiling. If he did something to upset, he would always say he was sorry,\" Ms Tran said.", "\"When I see Thomas's photos, I cry all of the time.\"", "She said it was difficult to cope with her grief.", "\"I don't want to leave the house anymore.\"", "Her husband, Mr Nhieu, told the court of the deep impact of losing his child.", "\"We were so proud of him for 20 years,\" he said.", "\"He is our only child, and we worked so hard for him, and it's all gone in a second.", "", "
Mr Tran's girlfriend Trish Nguyen, last year described her boyfriend as \"the funniest person you'd ever meet\".(Supplied)
", "He said the pain of his loss would always be there.", "\"I feel we can no longer plan for the future and that every day is more like survival,\" Mr Nhieu said.", "
Aliti writes apology letter to Tran family
", "In sentencing Aliti, the judge said he had to take in a range of considerations, including the impact on Mr Tran's family and deterrence to others to commit such a crime.", "But the judge also said he had to consider Aliti's young age, his lack of a previous criminal record, his remorse and chance of rehabilitation, as well as his epilepsy.", "The judge read out a letter of apology Aliti wrote to the court and a letter of apology he wrote to the Tran family.", "In that letter, Aliti told the Tran family that he wished he had never gone to Oakleigh that night and he would act differently if he had his time again.", "He said he understood \"because of me Thomas will never return to his family\" and that he would have to live with that guilt for the rest of his life.", "\"From the bottom of my heart, I am truly sorry.\"", "
Judge says sentence not a reflection of the life lost
", "The judge told the court he had \"agonised\" over the sentence, and that sentencing wasn't a simple mathematical formula.", "He said Aliti had been a bright student from a close extended family, but his studies had gone downhill after he started suffering seizures caused by his epilepsy.", "The judge told the court he considered Aliti's comments after the stabbing arose from \"bravado\", which he \"now regrets.\"", "He said Aliti's prospects of rehabilitation were strong and said he thought it was unlikely he would offend again.", "But the judge also told the Tran family his sentence was not a reflection of the worth of Mr Tran's young life.", "Aliti was allowed to farewell his family and was taken into custody from the court hearing."]
